author: cms-tau-pog
body:
#### PR description:

As title of this PR says it is about removal of the obsolete `RecoTauTag/ImpactParameter` package.

Code in the package has not been used for some time already; the package contains modules that cannot be run because they rely on outdated and removed functionality. In case of interest to reuse some functionalities of the package, e.g. fits of 3-prongs taus to a1 mass, one will need anyhow to write new modules (maybe recycling part of removed code from git archives). 

This PR addresses issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37974.

#### PR validation:

Checked that headers from the package are not used anywhere in CMSSW and that modules defined there are not part of any official workflow (they would not run).

Representative matrix test no. 10024.0 (TTbar_13+2017+TTbar_13TeV_TuneCUETP8M1_GenSimINPUT+Digi+RecoFakeHLT+HARVESTFakeHLT+ALCA+Nano) successful. 
The "limited" set of matrix tests is ongoing - the PR description will be updated when they finish.
title: Removal of obsolete RecoTauTag/ImpactParameter package
